name: Alien Lockdown
description:
The player is the last survivor of his stranded spaceship, he has to survive the monsters as long as possible while waiting for help with his blaster and the few remaining ammunition.

This little game was made in solo during 4 hours with GameMaker Studio 2.

Music credit:

Titre:  Subdivision Of The Masses

Auteur: Philipp Weigl

Source: https://philippweigl.bandcamp.com

Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.fr
